SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY teem.CR_DT DESC) AS rnum , mteem.TFC_ENF_EQP_ID , mteem.ROAD_ADDR , mteem.EQP_TY , mteem.CR_DT , mteem.CR_OPRTR_ID , mteem.USE_YN , mteem.MNFCTR FROM MOZ_TFC_ENF_EQP_MASTER mteem WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY rnum LIMIT #{length} OFFSET #{start}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "cnt" FROM MOZ_TFC_ENF_EQP_MASTER WHERE 1=1

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY teem.CR_DT) AS rnum , teem.TFC_ENF_EQP_ID , teem.ROAD_ADDR , teem.EQP_TY , teem.CR_DT , teem.CR_OPRTR_ID , teem.USE_YN , teem.MNFCTR , teem.EQP_NM , teem.LAT , teem.LNG , cct.CD_NM , wot.OPRTR_NM FROM MOZ_TFC_ENF_EQP_MASTER teem INNER JOIN MOZ_CM_CD cct ON teem.EQP_TY = cct.CD_ID INNER JOIN MOZ_WEB_OPRTR wot ON teem.CR_OPRTR_ID = wot.OPRTR_ID WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY rnum DESC LIMIT #{length} OFFSET #{start}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "cnt" FROM MOZ_TFC_ENF_EQP_MASTER teem INNER JOIN MOZ_CM_CD cct ON teem.EQP_TY = cct.CD_ID WHERE 1=1

SELECT teem.TFC_ENF_EQP_ID , teem.ROAD_ADDR , teem.LAT , teem.LNG , teem.EQP_TY , teem.CR_DT , teem.CR_OPRTR_ID , teem.USE_YN , teem.MNFCTR , teem.STTS_INFO_GNR_CY , teem.FREIGHT_VH_LMT_SPD , teem.NR_VH_LMT_SPD , teem.ROAD_LN_QY , teem.CR_OPRTR_DEPT , teem.TFC_ENF_EQP_INFO , teem.TFC_ENF_EQP_IMAGEPATH , teem.TFC_ENF_EQP_IMAGENAME , teem.TFC_ENF_EQP_IMAGEORGNAME , teem.EQP_NM , teem.MODEL_NM , teem.INSTL_YN , teem.INSTL_DATE , teem.INSTLER , cct.CD_NM , wot.OPRTR_NM , teefi.FILE_ORG_NM , teefi.EQP_FILE_NO FROM MOZ_TFC_ENF_EQP_MASTER teem LEFT JOIN MOZ_CM_CD cct ON teem.EQP_TY = cct.CD_ID LEFT JOIN MOZ_WEB_OPRTR wot ON teem.CR_OPRTR_ID = wot.OPRTR_ID LEFT JOIN MOZ_TFC_ENF_EQP_FILE_INFO teefi ON teem.TFC_ENF_EQP_ID = teefi.TFC_ENF_EQP_ID WHERE teem.TFC_ENF_EQP_ID=#{tfcEnfEqpId}
SELECT COUNT(MTEEM.TFC_ENF_EQP_ID) AS 'TOTALCNT', SUM(CASE WHEN MTEEM.USE_YN = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS 'ONCNT' FROM MOZ_TFC_ENF_EQP_MASTER MTEEM
